meanings.definition: A piece of material worn over one eye to protect it or to aid in vision.
meanings.sent1: The pirate wore an eyepatch to cover his injured eye.
meanings.sent2: She wore an eyepatch after her eye surgery.
meanings.sent3: The costume party had everyone wearing an eyepatch for fun.
meanings.sent4: The eyepatch transformed him into a mysterious character.
meanings.sent5: The black eyepatch stood out against his pale skin.

meanings.definition: To cover or conceal one eye with a patch.
meanings.sent1: He had to eyepatch his eye to protect it from the bright light.
meanings.sent2: She decided to eyepatch her eye during the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to eyepatch his eye for a trick, but it didn't work.
meanings.sent4: She had to eyepatch her eye to focus better on the target.
meanings.sent5: The detective had to eyepatch his eye to blend in with the crowd.
